hasMessage.hasTextContent: Velpatasvir   with sofosbuvir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises monitor adverse effects and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Venetoclax is predicted to increase the exposure to simvastatin. Manufacturer advises monitor.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Venetoclax   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises monitor .

hasDitaContent.@value: Verapamil moderately increases the exposure to simvastatin. Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Verapamil   moderately   increases   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises monitor and adjust dose .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both simvastatin and vincristine can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  simvastatin  and  vincristine  can increase the risk of hepatotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Voriconazole is predicted to increase the exposure to simvastatin. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voriconazole   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Voxilaprevir with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir is predicted to increase the exposure to simvastatin. Manufacturer advises avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Voxilaprevir   with sofosbuvir and velpatasvir   is predicted to   increase   the exposure to   simvastatin .  Manufacturer advises avoid .
